name: A Festa do Pijama da Agatha
name_original: A Festa do Pijama da Agatha
description:
Agatha's Sleepover - Game proposal made in 72h for Woman Game Jam 2022

   Agatha was a young child with a lot of imagination, her days were simple, she spent her days at home in her room, playing with her toys, making drawings, and creating her stories. But one night, when her parents go out and leave her alone at home to do some chores, a story is about to begin, will be whether Agatha will follow the rules and enjoy the monotonous mandatory activities or will she break every single instruction to have fun with her the unimaginable.

░ ░ ░░░  ☼  ░░░ ░ ░

In this game you will accompany little agatha in her imaginary sleepover and help her to do her chores in this fun silent night

Little Missfortune, Cube Scape + Stanley Parable inspired mechanics 

  • Explore the house together with Agatha making the to-do list and discovering what you could do (and couldn't do), listening to everything that goes on in the little girl's imagination
  • But beware, you have a limit on how many tasks you can do, taking you to the end when that limit is reached. Some intentions need specific items, so you'll have to go through the same place more than once (just be careful not to get distracted by the television)
  • Exploring the house will make you discover not only about that environment, but also about the people who live there. As you walk around the house, listen to cute stories that Agatha thinks about while doing chores

History and Art

  • Inspirations for the story mostly came from childhood as Brazilian children (and who also spent more time in their own heads than in the real world)
  • With two artists with different styles working in both environments, we have strong inspirations from the styles of the 2000s with inspirations mainly from the arts of Hanna Barbera
  • +10 Songs and Original Sound Effects!

░ ░░  ☼  ░░ ░
